name: Pantheon
cost: 2x Clay AND 1x Ore AND 1x Glass AND 1x Papyrus AND 1x Cloth

name: Palace
cost: 1x Stone AND 1x Ore AND 1x Wood AND 1x Clay AND 1x Glass AND 1x Papyrus AND 1x Cloth

name: East Trading Post
provides: You only pay 1 coin when you buy a Raw Material from your clockwise neighbor (right)

name: West Trading Post
provides: You only pay 1 coin when you buy a Raw Material from your counter-clockwise neighbor (left)

name: Marketplace
provides: You only pay 1 coin when you buy a Manufactured Good from your neighbors

name: Forum
free with: East Trading Post OR West Trading Post

name: Caravansery
provides: +1 Wood OR +1 Stone OR +1 Ore OR +1 Clay

name: Vineyard
provides: +1 Coin per Raw Material in the neighboring cities AND in your own city

name: Bazar
provides: +2 Coin per Manufactured Good in the neighboring cities AND in your own city

name: Haven
provides: +1 Victory point AND +1 Coin per Raw Material in your own city

name: Lighthouse
provides: +1 Victory point AND +1 Coin per Commercial Structure in your own city

name: Chamber of Commerce
provides: +2 Victory points AND +2 Coin per Manufactured Good in your own city

name: Arena
provides: +1 Victory point AND +3 Coin per Wonder stage constructed in your own city

name: Workers Guild
cost: 1x Wood AND 1x Stone AND 1x Clay AND 2x Ore
provides: +1 Victory point per Raw Material in the neighboring cities

name: Craftsmens Guild
provides: +2 Victory points per Manufactured Good in the neighboring cities

name: Traders Guild
provides: +1 Victory point per Commercial Structure in the neighboring cities

name: Philosophers Guild
provides: +1 Victory point per Scientific Structure in the neighboring cities

name: Spies Guild
provides: +1 Victory point per Military Structure in the neighboring cities

name: Magistrates Guild
provides: +1 Victory point per Civilian Structure in the neighboring cities

name: Shipowners Guild
provides: +1 Victory point per Raw Material, Manufactured Good and Guilds in the neighboring cities

name: Strategists Guild
provides: +1 Victory point per defeat token in the neighboring cities

name: Scientists Guild
provides: Compass OR Gear OR Tablet (the most advantageous)

name: Builders Guild
provides: +1 Victory point per Wonder stage constructed in the neighboring cities and in your own city
